page.title: 07NORTHAMPTON BUS CORPORATION
page.content: A group of us went to the Bus Depot in St.James to find out about the town bus services.We were told that the total number of buses passing through the station was 278,645 p.a.and there were 26 different routes.The buses cover 2.3 million miles p.a.carrying 12 million assengers.Each bus cost Â£70,000 using diesel at the rate of 8 miles a gallon. The Bus Corporation lose about L.5M p.a which they borrow from the Rates in support.The Corporation is 100 years old and today employs 220 people 143 of them being drivers.The average wage for Bus Driver or Inspector is Â£120/week. The first bus service of the day is at 5.23a.m. the last at 00.15a.m.Today all the services are channelled through the Greyfriars Bus Station in the centre f town built at a cost of Â£7 million - County and National companies use it & here are services to mainland Europe.
